text: Ezɨ Samarian gumazamiziba bizir kam baregha, me zuamɨra ivemara ghua, Sirian mɨdorozir gumazibar averpenibar men bizir me taghiziba ini. Egha me plauan avɨriba ko baliba ini. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, me 1 kinara, 3 kilogrem plauan aghuir me witɨn ingarizim givesi, egha 1 kinara, 6 kilogrem bali givesi.
